1.
**Carbon Pricing:** Implementing a carbon pricing mechanism, as part of the bipartisan bill, could generate revenue for state and local governments.
This revenue could be used to fund local projects, support low-income communities, or reduce taxes.
This funding could be used to support low-carbon initiatives, businesses or retrain workers in affected industries.
This revenue could be invested in local initiatives supporting low-income households or businesses transitioning to cleaner practices.
